DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Performed Observation Outcome Data PCORnet CDM Lab Result Unit of Measure
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn._Converted/standardized units for the result.

ValueDomain.preferredName: PCORnet CDM Lab Result Unit of Measure

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified used as a standard measurement of same kinds, such as pound or kilogram in measuring weight. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified, used as a standard measurement of like kinds.
